author: Toni Stubing
content:
A question for the endurance athletes in here, do you get super hungry at times during your training or events? I do and I wonder if it's true hunger or something else. I don't eat anything till I get home. Curious if it happens to others
26 comments
Cody Vos
Send a super chat to Dr. Chaffee. He interviewed a decathlete recently. Perhaps he could help you.

replies.content: I have a 50km trail event in 4 weeks. In my long runs I have no sugar electrolytes and salami sticks. I do well that way. I used to go through so much more in the SAD way. I find my body just keeps on going.

replies.reply_by: Astrid 'Flowers' Boyle yes I thought about a meat snack of some kind. I've just been doing electrolytes. Good luck for your event! I'm hoping to do a 56k trail event end of September ü§û
